Package server.util

Class JavaClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • server.util.JavaClassLoader
  • public class JavaClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    class for compiling and loading at runtime (dynamic loading) inspired by autoloading in php
